description: Indigenous Services Canada requires reliable roundtrip transportation for FNIHB employees and contracted dentists with FNIHB from the Thompson Airport to its nursing station in Nelson House in Manitoba.
duration_in_months: But we want to display it as the value of 11 months
full_summary:
======================================

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title:** Transportation Services to Nelson House

**Reference Number:** cb-4959-37595247
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 1000247613/B

**Notice Detail**

*   **Publication Date:** April 24, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** May 19, 2023, 13:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** May 19, 2023
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 1, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

**Notice Status**
----------------

*   **Tender Status (ENG):** Expired
*   **Tender Status (FRA):** Expiré

**Service Requirements**
------------------------

*   Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) requires the provision of transportation services for First Nations and Inuit Health Branch (FNIHB) employees and contracted dentists from Thompson Airport to Nelson House Nursing Station in Manitoba.
*   The successful bidder will be awarded a contract with a term from contract award to March 31, 2024, and three one-year extension periods under the same terms and conditions.

**Notice Information**
---------------------

*   **Notice URL (ENG):** None
*   **Notice URL (FRA):** None
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Email: [miriam.britel\@sac-isc.gc.ca](mailto:miriam.britel@sac-isc.gc.ca)
    *   Phone: (873) 355-2463
    *   Address: 10 Wellington Street, Gatineau, QC K1A 0H4, Canada

**Attachment**
--------------

*   For English: [transportation-to-nelson-house](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/4959/rfp---transportation-to-nelson-house---solicitation-1000247613-b---en.pdf)
*   For French: [transport\_a\_nelson\_house](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/4959/ddp---transport-a-nelson-house---sollicitation-1000247613-b---fr.pdf)
